titleStmt.title: VVritten by one, whom the world calls a Quaker, Joh.17.2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9. Verses
titleStmt.author: R. F. (Richard Farnworth), d. 1666.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
One, whom the world calls a Quaker = Richard Farnworth. -- Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Drop-head title on page 1: A bunch of grapes, and an iron rod.
Wing (CD-ROM edition) reports title as "A bunch of grapes, and an iron rod."
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
